item.description:
The mystic Rumi declared total love for God in this one ecstatic statement. Find out what it means to truly be a mystic and experience the love of God burning inside of you.
Saturday, November 10, 10am
Suggested Donation $40, Bring a Friend for Free!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Mother Clare Seminar Pt 3: I Want Burning, Burning, Burning
